text: The Treaty of Paris was signed in February 1623 between France, Savoy, and Venice. All three signatories agreed to re-establish the territory of Valtelline by attempting to remove Spanish forces stationed there. ==See also== *List of treaties ==External links== *Thirty Years War 1621 to 1626 *The Valtelline (1603–1639) Category:1623 in Italy Category:1623 in France Category:Treaties of the Republic of Venice Category:1623 treaties Paris (1623) Category:Treaties of the Duchy of Savoy Category:History of Paris Category:17th century in Paris Category:1623 in the Republic of Venice
title: Treaty of Paris (1623)
